text: Clarke Timothy Gayford (born 24 October 1976) is a New Zealand radio and television broadcaster. He was a presenter of the fishing documentary show Fish of the Day. He is the husband of former New Zealand Prime Minister Jacinda Ardern. ==References== Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Jacinda Ardern Category:New Zealand television presenters Category:New Zealand radio personalities
title: Clarke Gayford
